question: Which among the following statements is not correct about Oceanic Trenches?
option1: They are the deepest parts of the oceans.
option2: They cover nearly 40% of the ocean floor.
option3: They run parallel to the bordering fold mountains or the island chains.
option4: They are associated with active volcanoes and strong earthquakes.
answer: They cover nearly 40% of the ocean floor.
explanation:
Oceanic trenches, some of the deepest spots on earth, are long, narrow, relatively steep-sided depressions in the deep sea.   They run parallel to the bordering fold mountains or the island chains. They are associated with active volcanoes and strong earthquakes. This makes them very significant in the study of plate movements.
Abyssal Plains cover nearly 40% of the ocean floor.
